text.5_Chapter, 24_Verse: May Hashem cause His countenance to shine when you are engrossed in Torah, and He will reveal secrets to you.
text.5_Chapter, 25_Verse: May Hashem lift His face. May Hashem turn to you with a good countenance in your prayers.
text.13_Chapter, 0_Verse: That night. And that night was fixed as a night of crying for generations.
